loans.use: to buy five gallons of cooking oil, half a bag of onions and more for her business.

loans.name: Sobhana Priyadarshini Shg-B Group

texts.en:
Lalita, age 27, is standing on the extreme left with a scarf on her head. She resides in the village of Chuhapali in the Bargarh district and is the featured borrower of Sobhana Priyadarshini SHG-B. She lives with her husband, who owns a betel shop, and her two sons, who are currently in primary school. Lalita is content with the income that her husband earns; almost all her household expenses are borne by her husband.

However, Lalita does not have access to clean drinking water. The water that she gets through the pipeline is very polluted and is unfit for drinking. Therefore Lalita, along with her group members, has requested a loan of 36,000 Indian rupees. Lalita will use her portion of the loan to purchase a water purifier to provide her family with safe drinking water and prevent them from deadly waterborne diseases.

Lalita looks forward to a healthy and happy life with her small and sweet family.

loans.use: to purchase a water purifier

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase one bale of used clothing for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soft drinks, French bread, ham, mayonnaise, and other ingredients for making hot dog sandwiches and ham sandwiches.

loans.name: Hatunchaskas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “HATUNCHASKAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Catherine ella es soltera y tiene 47 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja como profesora del nivel primario, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un negocio para vender la ropa. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar un televisor para su casa.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de carpintería.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The partners belong to the community bank "Hatunchaskas". This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco. 

The partner is Catherine. She is 47 years old and single and has three children. The partner works as a primary school teacher and works from 8:00am until 2:00pm. She has been in this business for 8 years and she does well. Her dream is to have a business selling clothing. She is requesting a loan to buy a television for her home.

The partner's photo attached to the group photo was taken after the meeting because of work reasons. The other partners have businesses selling crafts, clothing, groceries and doing carpentry. The partner is grateful to those who are part of this dream through this medium and promises to comply with the payment of her loan by the deadline.

loans.use: to buy a  television for her home.

loans.name: Mzia

texts.en:
Mzia, who is a 51-year-old woman, lives in the Tskaltubo district. She has a pensioner mother and brother and a school-aged son. Mzia is the only breadwinner in the family, and works as a school cleaner to make a living wage for the family. However, she finds it hard to tackle the financial difficulties and requires support to increase her income.

Mzia requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a trading business startup but without any success. Her loan request was rejected each time because the creditors did not find the existing family income to be sufficient to approve the loan. Mzia requested a loan from Credo to start a trading business. Her loan request was approved in the framework of a joint initiative by Kiva and Credo. The start up loan program provides start up credit soft conditions for the country's rural poor, who, regarded as "high risk borrowers" because of their low income, do not have access to credit products. With the received credit, Mzia will purchase stock of used clothing and sell locally with price mark-ups. She will get the chance to generate additional income and satisfy her family's increased needs.

Mzia will be very grateful for financial support and kindness.

loans.use: To start trading with used clothing.

loans.name: Marthe Hortense

texts.fr:
Marthe Hortense a 33 ans. Elle est mère de trois enfants de 6, 7 et 9 ans et qui sont tous scolarisés dans une école privée. Marthe et son époux exerce le même type d'activité , vente des chaussures à l'occasion depuis leur union, il y a maintenant 10 années.
Pour pouvoir continuer à développer et étendre l'activité, elle fait recours à un prêt. c'est le moyen le plus simple, rapide  et efficace qu'elle trouve pour parvenir à son objectif. Elle vise à ouvrir un autre point de vente.
Actuellement, sa famille habite dans une maison appartenant à ses beaux parents et de ce fait, elle envisage de continuer à épargner davantage et construire sa propre maison. C'est son rêve le plus cher.
texts.en:
Marthe Hortense is thirty-three years old. She is the mother of three children aged six, seven, and nine, who all go to private school.

Marthe and her husband have been in the same business, the retail of second-hand shoes, since they got married ten years ago to date.

To be able to keep on developing and growing the business, she is turning to a loan; it is the simplest, fastest, and most effective way she found to reach her goal. She targets opening another point of sale.

Her family currently lives in a house belonging to her in-laws; because of this, she wants to keep on saving more and to build her own house. This is her dearest dream.

loans.use: to buy more second-hand shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy raffia, cardboard holders, straps, and spare parts for bicycles.

loans.name: Cira

texts.es:
Cira tiene 49 años de edad, vive con su menor hijo, en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Aramango que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Bagua, región Amazonas, en la selva norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

cira se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de varios años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de piña así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Cira espera ofrecer piña de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Cira is 49 years old. She lives with her youngest son, in her own house built of rustic materials in the Aramango district, which is located in the province of Bagua, in the region of Amazonas, in the northern jungles of Peru. Life in this area is calm and quiet. The residents work primarily in agriculture, commerce, and cattle.

Cira works in agriculture, in pineapple farming, to be specific. She has several years of experience in the business and she has very good personal and work references in the area. The loan that she will be given will be used to buy manure and fertilizers in order to provide good maintenance care for her pineapple crop, and also to pay for labor at harvest time. With this, Cira hopes to offer better quality pineapples to her customers, which will have a positive impact on her income and, therefore, her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers in order to provide good maintenance care for her pineapple crop.
